channel.title: Market Failure : Solutions
channel.description:
Hey, i'm doing A levels atm in second year. But i've got this really annoying task presentations in which i have to do.
Basically i have to found out the "Remedies of Market Failure", like the solutions of market failure. I been searching website for information, but it only tells me info about market failure, not solutions to it.
Here are the reasons for market failures -
* Monopoly* * Monopsony * Oligopoly * Cartel * Oligopsony * Monopolistic competition * Price discrimination * Price skimming
Anyone shed any light ... ?
Thanks...man A2 is annoying...

item.title: Market Failure : Solutions
item.dc:creator: @Hexzar Hexzar
item.description:
@Hexzar wrote:

Hey, i’m doing A levels atm in second year. But i’ve got this really annoying task presentations in which i have to do.

Basically i have to found out the “Remedies of Market Failure”, like the solutions of market failure. I been searching website for information, but it only tells me info about market failure, not solutions to it.

Here are the reasons for market failures -

* Monopoly*
* Monopsony
* Oligopoly
* Cartel
* Oligopsony
* Monopolistic competition
* Price discrimination
* Price skimming

Anyone shed any light … ?

Thanks…man A2 is annoying…
